ygData.subject: Re: Non-twinked Druids
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, all! I play a 29 Wizard that just got his port spells. I have made several Hotkeys that give OOC speaches advertising my Port destinations, and
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, all!<br><br>I play a 29 Wizard that just got
his port spells. I have made several Hotkeys that
give OOC speaches advertising my Port destinations,
and also asking for donations. Asking for donations
usually gets you more than the price you would ask, and
you (almost) never get someone who refuses to
pay...they know that there is a price up front. If someone
is just broke and desperate, I'm always happy to
give them a port to help out. Asking for donations is
a good way to avoid the "Gee...I thought it was for
free" thing, and everyone is happy. Give it a
try!)<br><br>Shahazred Muhajadin<br>29 Wizard on Rotcet Nife<br>Shadows
of Honor
